channel.title: Unity [PI - Last release from meh]
channel.description:
Lets cut to the chase. I'm quitting. I just.... have more things to do and this community is just putting me off (not in a bad way, larv all you guys), so I might have a long break, or just quit for ever. Not sure yet, will decide soon: so meh :\.
So I've cleaned my whole pc from rs related crap and decided to release this (I also have another server, but I'm not going to release it), as I don't see how it will help the community (with all the 602 shit).
I don't have much time, so lets cut to the chase with what this server includes:
[ul][li]Fairly good, organized combat[/li] [li]Server sided music player (0.2%/2.0%)[/li] [li]Client sided sounds (type ::varrockmusic to verify it works :P)[/li] [li]Teleports[/li] [li]Random events[/li] [li]Hyperion shit[/li] [li]Fairly decent packaging[/li] [li]Gnome glider and boat systems[/li] [li]Door/ladder manager[/li] [li]459 gameframe[/li] [li]Flax picking[/li] [li]Object definition[/li] [li]Pathfinder[/li] [li]Realish pin system[/li] [li]Chinchompa's - real range formulas (based off RWiki's)[/li] [li]A lot of buggies fixed[/li][/ul]
Picture of the day:
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/23l4yq.png[/img]
Not one of my better releases, but oh well:
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?si94czo1ijvrrzi]Packaged[/url]
Couple of bugs, nothing major: you'll just have to fix them.
CREDITS:
This community - met everyone, made some friends, cool people and just had a laugh Netzo
Anyone else who wants it

item.title: Unity [PI - Last release from meh]
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

Lets cut to the chase. I’m quitting. I just… have more things to do and this community is just putting me off (not in a bad way, larv all you guys), so I might have a long break, or just quit for ever. Not sure yet, will decide soon: so meh :.

So I’ve cleaned my whole pc from rs related crap and decided to release this (I also have another server, but I’m not going to release it), as I don’t see how it will help the community (with all the 602 shit).

I don’t have much time, so lets cut to the chase with what this server includes:

[ul][li]Fairly good, organized combat[/li]
[li]Server sided music player (0.2%/2.0%)[/li]
[li]Client sided sounds (type ::varrockmusic to verify it works :P)[/li]
[li]Teleports[/li]
[li]Random events[/li]
[li]Hyperion shit[/li]
[li]Fairly decent packaging[/li]
[li]Gnome glider and boat systems[/li]
[li]Door/ladder manager[/li]
[li]459 gameframe[/li]
[li]Flax picking[/li]
[li]Object definition[/li]
[li]Pathfinder[/li]
[li]Realish pin system[/li]
[li]Chinchompa’s - real range formulas (based off RWiki’s)[/li]
[li]A lot of buggies fixed[/li][/ul]

Picture of the day:

23l4yq.png759×498

Not one of my better releases, but oh well:

Packaged

Couple of bugs, nothing major: you’ll just have to fix them.

CREDITS:

This community - met everyone, made some friends, cool people and just had a laugh
Netzo

Anyone else who wants it
